text: Napiye! Muhminana penkal unkalitam vantu, allahvukku epporulaiyum inaivaippatillaiyenrum, tirutuvatillai enrum, vipaccaram ceyvatillai enrum, tankal pillaikalai kolvatillai enrum, tankal kaikalukkum, tankal kalkalukkum itaiyil etanai avarkal karpanai ceykirarkalo, attakaiya avaturai ittukkattik kontu varuvatillai enrum, melum nanmaiyana (kariyat)til umakku maru ceyvatillaiyenrum, avarkal um'mitam pai'attu - vakkuruti ceytal avarkalutaiya vakkurutiyai erruk kolviraka, melum avarkalukkaka allahvitam mannipput tetuviraka, niccayamaka allah mikavum mannippavan, mikka kirupaiyutaiyavan
